amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt settlement agreements based on race, religion, national origin, or any other protected category.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 115-363 to exempt settlement agreements based on race, religion, national origin, or any other protected category.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 233 (Roll no. 575).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 233 (Roll no. 575).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Cohen.
